explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an Attention-based Fuzzy Neural Network (AFNN) for forecasting financial crises, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.classification: The AFNN model is used to classify companies based on their financial data to predict financial crises, which is a classification task.
explanations.neural network: The paper introduces a novel Attention-based Fuzzy Neural Network (AFNN), which is a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: The AFNN model involves deep learning techniques to parse multi-source data for financial crisis prediction.
explanations.attention mechanism: The proposed AFNN model incorporates an attention mechanism to enhance its performance in parsing multi-source data.
